item.title: PinT 2024 Workshop
item.description:
Registration for PinT 2024 - 13th Workshop on Parallel-in-time integration is open. It is free of charge to attend the workshop. Please visit the conference website at https://time-x.eu/pint-2024/ for more information. The deadline for registration is 1 December 2023, and will (conforming to academic folklore) be extended only once to 15 December 2023.

If you are interested in presenting your work in a talk at the workshop, we kindly ask you to submit your abstract (title + description) to pint2024@timex-eurohpc.eu. Abstract submission deadline: 15 December 2023.

item.title: PinT 2021 Workshop
item.description: Registration for virtual PinT 2021 - 10th Workshop on Parallel-in-time integration is open. There is no cost to attend the workshop. Attendees will need to pre-register to participate. Please visit thhe conference website at https://conferences.math.mtu.edu for more information.

item.title: PinT lecture at ENLA Seminar
item.description:
Martin Gander gave a very nice talk on a linear algebra approach to time parallelisation as part of the European Numerical Linear Algebra (ENLA) online seminar. The video for the talk can be found at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DfY_w6KnfhU

A full list of past ENLA lectures can be found at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl3AmvN5JwD4FUJn2aLKDZQ

item.title: PinT 2020 Workshop
item.description: Registration for virtual PinT 2020 - 9th Workshop on Parallel-in-time integration is open. There is no cost to attend the workshop. Attendees will need to pre-register at https://michigantech.zoom.us/meeting/register/upUsd-6hqj4iGNa05WE3Ey2RkX26G6K7-Q to participate.

item.title: PINT 2019 Workshop
item.description: Registration for the 8th Workshop on Parallel-in-time integration is now open. Since this workshop is organised through the Centre for Interdisciplinary Research of Bielefeld University, registration requires a formal invite. Please email one of the organisers to express your interest in attending and they will arrange for an invitation.

item.title: PINT at SIAM Annual Meeting 2018
item.description:
Parallel-in-time integration is also represented with a mini symposium at the SIAM Annual Meeting 2018. This means that the topic will be/was present at three major SIAM conferences in 2018:

  • SIAM Parallel Processing in Scientific Computing 2018 in Tokyo, Japan.
  • SIAM Conference on Applied Linear Algebra 2018 in Hong Kong, China.
  • SIAM Annual Meeting 2018 in Oregon, USA.

item.title: Abstract submission for 7th PINT Workshop now open
item.description: Abstract submission is now open for the 7th Workshop on Parallel-in-time Integration, taking place from 2nd to 5th May 2018 in Roscoff, France.

item.title: PinT at SIAM Linear Algebra
item.description:
Parallel-in-time integration present also at the SIAM Conference on Applied Linear Algebra.

Thanks to Xiao-Chuan Cai and Hans De Sterck for putting together a mini symposium on iterative solvers for parallel-in-time integration at SIAM ALA 2018 in Hong Kong. After PinT being present in all SIAM PP and SIAM CSE conferences since 2013, including this yearâ€™s SIAM Parallel Processing 2018, this is the first time it features prominently at SIAM ALA.

item.title: 2018 PINT workshop in Roscoff, France
item.description:
The 7th workshop on parallel-in-time integration will take place in May 2018 in Roscoff, France.

Please see here for additional information.

item.title: Submission open for 6th workshop on parallel-in-time integration
item.description:
Abstract submission is now open for the 6th International Workshop on Parallel-in-time integration.

You can find information about how to submit an abstract here. The workshop will take place from 23 to 27 October 2017 in Ascona, Switzerland. The registration fee is 500 CHF and includes accommodation in the Monte Verita Conference Centre.
